name: 3dTORTOISEtoHere
author: AFNI Developers
description: Convert standard TORTOISE DTs (diagonal-first format) to standard AFNI (lower triangular, row-wise) format.

inputs.description: Diffusion tensor file with six bricks of DT components ordered in the TORTOISE manner (Dxx, Dyy, Dzz, Dxy, Dxz, Dyz).
inputs.name: DT file

inputs.description: Output file name prefix. Will have N+1 bricks when GRADFILE has N rows of gradients.
inputs.name: Prefix

inputs.description: Optional switch to rescale the DT elements, dividing by a number X>0.
inputs.name: Scale factor

inputs.description: Change sign of the first element of (inner) eigenvectors.
inputs.name: Flip X

inputs.description: Change sign of the second element of (inner) eigenvectors.
inputs.name: Flip Y

inputs.description: Change sign of the third element of (inner) eigenvectors.
inputs.name: Flip Z

output-files.description: Output AFNI-style DT file with the following ordering of the 6 bricks: Dxx, Dxy, Dyy, Dxz, Dyz, Dzz.
output-files.name: Output DT file
